00029 class t_blobbrush: public t_brush
00030 {
00031     private:
00032         float sharpness;
00033     
00034     public:
00035         void create(int width, int height, float sharpness= 0.0)
00036         {
00037             if(width!=height) return;   // geht (noch) nicht
00038             if(width<1) width= 1;
00039             if(height<1) height= 1;
00040             this->width= width; this->height= height;
00041             this->sharpness= sharpness;
00042             type= BRUSHTYPE_BLOB;
00043             pixels= (float*)realloc(pixels, width*height*sizeof(float));
00044             mkblobf(pixels, width, sharpness);
00045         }
00046         
00047         t_blobbrush(int width, int height, float sharpness= 0.0)
00048         {
00049             create(width, height, sharpness);
00050         }
00051         
00052         float getsharpness() { return sharpness; }
00053         
00054         void resize(int width, int height)
00055         {
00056             create(width, height, sharpness);
00057         }
